files.sample_excerpt:
# Cheeky Prints – Hydrogen Starter

Quick start:
1) npm i
2) cp .env.example .env and set Shopify values
3) Place your mascot at public/assets/mascots/cheeky-hero.webp
4) npm run dev

import type { LinksFunction } from '@remix-run/react'
import { Links, LiveReload, Meta, Outlet, Scripts, ScrollRestoration } from '@remix-run/react'
import stylesheet from './styles/tailwind.css?url'
export const links: LinksFunction = () => [{ rel: 'stylesheet', href: stylesheet }]
export default function App(){return(<html lang='en' className='h-full'><head><meta charSet='utf-8'/><meta name='viewport' content='width=device-width, initial-scale=1'/><Meta/><Links/></head><body className='bg-ink

import { Link } from '@remix-run/react'
import { useEffect } from 'react'
import Lenis from '@studio-freight/lenis'
import gsap from 'gsap'
import ScrollTrigger from 'gsap/ScrollTrigger'
import ClientOnly from '~/components/ClientOnly'
import HeroCanvas from '~/components/HeroCanvas'
gsap.registerPlugin(ScrollTrigger)
export default function Index(){useEffect(()=>{const lenis=new Lenis({lerp:0.08,smoothWheel:true});const raf=(t:number)=>{lenis.raf(t);requestAnimationFrame(raf)};requestAnimationF

import type { LoaderFunctionArgs } from '@remix-run/node'
import { useLoaderData, Link } from '@react-router-dom'
export async function loader({ params }: LoaderFunctionArgs){const { handle }=params;return { handle, products: Array.from({length:8}).map((_,i)=>({id:i,title:`Sample ${i+1}`,price:(i+1)*10})) }}
export default function CollectionHandle(){const { handle, products } = useLoaderData<any>();const title=String(handle).toUpperCase();return(<main className='mx-auto max-w-6xl px-6 py-28'><h

import { useEffect, useState } from 'react'
export default function ClientOnly({children}:{children:React.ReactNode}){const [m,setM]=useState(false);useEffect(()=>setM(true),[]);return m?<>{children}</>:null}

import * as THREE from 'three'
import { Canvas, useFrame } from '@react-three/fiber'
import { Float, Text, useTexture } from '@react-three/drei'
import { useRef } from 'react'
function ParallaxMascot(){const ref=useRef<THREE.Mesh>(null!);const tex=useTexture('/assets/mascots/cheeky-hero.webp');tex.encoding=THREE.sRGBEncoding;useFrame(({clock,camera,mouse})=>{const t=clock.getElapsedTime();if(ref.current){ref.current.position.z=-0.2+Math.sin(t*0.6)*0.05;ref.current.rotation.z=Math.sin(t*0.5)*0.03

@tailwind base;@tailwind components;@tailwind utilities;:root{--bg-grad:radial-gradient(1000px 600px at 10% 0%,rgba(255,44,195,0.25),transparent 60%),radial-gradient(900px 500px at 90% 20%,rgba(59,247,255,0.25),transparent 60%),radial-gradient(800px 400px at 50% 100%,rgba(255,173,0,0.18),transparent 60%);}html,body,#__remix{height:100%}body{background-color:#0C0F29;background-image:var(--bg-grad);background-attachment:fixed}.motion-safe .anim-gradient{animation:hue 18s linear infinite}@keyframes
Add your mascot image as 'cheeky-hero.webp' here.
